imports:
import Badge from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Badge";
import Stack from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Stack";
example:
(): React.Node => (
  <Stack flex>
    <Badge type="warning" icon={<Icons.Alert ariaLabel="Warning" />}>
      Not yet confirmed
    </Badge>
    <Badge type="warningInverted" icon={<Icons.Alert ariaLabel="Warning" />}>
      Not yet confirmed
    </Badge>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Warning badges
info.description: Warning badges highlight information that might have a negative impact on the user but isnâ€™t critical. They are associated with negative emotions so only use them occasionally to stop potential problems before they happen.
